text:
Hey all,
How to insert multiple rows in a HubDb table using 'Add a Row' API created by HubSpot

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/cms/hubdb>
I am only able to insert single row at a time
Try the `/cms/v3/hubdb/tables/{tableIdOrName}/rows/draft/batch/create` "Create rows in batch" endpoint

:wave: Hello! Is there any developer here that would like to have a look at our website in order to help us optimize it properly? We are looking for HubSpot developers who can help us imporve the overall performance of our website, especially for mobile! Please feel free to email me at <mailto:comunicazione@vicla.eu|comunicazione@vicla.eu>
Hi, I am good at optimizing website.
Do you have an email address where I can send you more information?
Thank you| I will send you and email!
hey, mate. Did you email me?

Hey guys! I would be endlessly grateful for insight into an issue I am having when using our company APP survey with a corresponding HubSpot form. I am using this article (<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/submit_form>) to call from a survey in our app and bring the data into HubSpot and having error codes.
This is a screenshot example of the survey format in our app
Has anyone used Zapier to map *Company* data from Stripe > HubSpot? I am wondering how Zap would even find the right company since Stripe does not have the Company object ID
